llm_text:
Why: The model flag is driven primarily by payment_format_ach = 1 (increase), which has the largest positive SHAP contribution, indicating ACH format strongly raised the score. Secondary contributors were amount_received = 14962.8 (increase) and amount_paid = 14962.8 (increase), both increasing the score (similar sizable amounts). dayofweek = 6 (increase) also raised the score, indicating weekend timing contributed. These factors combined increased the model output above the alert threshold.

Conclusion: The alert is mainly attributable to payment_format_ach (increase) together with high identical amounts (amount_received and amount_paid) and Sunday execution (dayofweek = 6). If an ACH transfer of ~14,962.8 occurs on dayofweek = 6, the model is more likely to flag it â€” further review of payment purpose and counterparty details is recommended.
